metadata.name: Custom Alert
metadata.author: Custom Components
metadata.description: A custom alert component with icon and dismissible functionality

styles.css: .rx-custom-alert { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 12px; background: var(--alert-bg, #fff3cd); color: var(--alert-color, #856404); border: 1px solid var(--alert-border, #ffc107); padding: var(--alert-padding, 12px 16px); border-radius: var(--alert-border-radius, 8px); font-size: 14px; transition: all 0.2s ease; } .rx-custom-alert .alert-icon { font-size: 18px; line-height: 1; flex-shrink: 0; } .rx-custom-alert .alert-message { flex: 1; line-height: 1.5; } .rx-custom-alert .alert-close { background: none; border: none; color: inherit; font-size: 20px; cursor: pointer; padding: 0; width: 24px; height: 24px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; opacity: 0.7; transition: opacity 0.2s; flex-shrink: 0; } .rx-custom-alert .alert-close:hover { opacity: 1; } .rx-custom-alert--info { --alert-bg: #d1ecf1; --alert-color: #0c5460; --alert-border: #bee5eb; } .rx-custom-alert--success { --alert-bg: #d4edda; --alert-color: #155724; --alert-border: #c3e6cb; } .rx-custom-alert--warning { --alert-bg: #fff3cd; --alert-color: #856404; --alert-border: #ffc107; } .rx-custom-alert--danger { --alert-bg: #f8d7da; --alert-color: #721c24; --alert-border: #f5c6cb; }

library.css: .rx-lib .rx-custom-alert { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; padding: var(--alert-padding, 14px 18px); border-radius: var(--alert-border-radius, 10px); background: var(--alert-bg); color: var(--alert-color); border: 1px solid var(--alert-border); font-size: 13px; font-weight: 500; transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); cursor: pointer; } .rx-lib .rx-custom-alert .alert-icon { font-size: var(--rx-icon-size, 18px); } .rx-lib .rx-custom-alert:hover { transform: translateY(-1px); box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); }

dismissible.description: Whether the alert can be dismissed

close.description: Triggered when the alert is dismissed
